messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Current temp Grand Canyon. I can't read Celsius.

messages.name: search_location_around_lat_lon
messages.content: [{'phone_number': '+19286387888', 'name': 'Grand Canyon National Park', 'full_address': 'Grand Canyon National Park, Arizona', 'full_address_array': ['Arizona'], 'latitude': 36.2678855, 'longitude': -112.3535253, 'review_count': 62233, 'rating': 4.8, 'timezone': 'America/Phoenix', 'website': 'https://www.nps.gov/grca/index.htm', 'types': ['National park', 'Tourist attraction'], 'price_level': None, 'working_hours': {'Friday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Saturday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Sunday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Monday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Tuesday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Wednesday': ['Open 24 hours'], 'Thursday': ['Open 24 hours']}, 'city': 'Arizona', 'is_claimed': True, 'state': 'Open 24 hours', 'description': ['Mile-deep landmark with panoramic vistas', 'Beyond its scenic overlooks, this mile-deep geologic wonder features hikes, mule rides & rafting.', None, 't', 't']}]

The closest relevant location tool only gave me the park headquarters, but to get the current temperature we’d need live weather data, which isn’t supplied. Could you look up today’s temperature (in °C) for the Grand Canyon using your weather app, and then let me know the value? I can instantly convert it to °F for you as soon as you give me the Celsius number.
Sorry, I don't have the temperature in Celsius. Can you use the tools to figure it out?

I don’t actually have a weather-data tool available, only a location-search tool and a unit-converter. The location search gave me details about Grand Canyon National Park (coordinates, phone, website, etc.) but no live temperature, and the unit-converter expects you to provide the Celsius number to convert.  
So, with the current toolset, I can’t obtain the temperature in °C—just convert it once you supply it.
You're welcome! If you do find the Celsius temperature later and still want it converted to Fahrenheit, just let me know the number and I’ll take care of it.
